text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bishareih adhkuruu ma 'aneam allah bih ealaykum min niemat alamni, w'ilqa' alrueb fi qulub 'aedayikum aladhin 'araduu 'an yubtishuu bikima, fasarafahum allah eanakum, wahal baynahum wabayn ma 'araduh bikima, wataquu allah wahdharuhu, watawkaluu ealaa allah wahdah fi 'umurikum aldiyniat waldiniawiati, wthiqu bieawnih wanusurah
